author: wtopstaff
title: Trail Blazers-Clippers, Box
text:

Harkless 0-0 2-2 2, Leonard 3-6 2-2 9, Plumlee 3-4 2-4 8, McCollum 8-20 2-2 22, Lillard 14-30 10-10 39, Crabbe 3-11 2-3 10, Davis 2-5 1-2 5, Vonleh 4-4 1-4 9, Connaughton 2-5 0-0 5. Totals 39-85 22-29 109. L.A. CLIPPERS (115)
